testcase.classname: US_008 Patients should make appointment after logged in
testcase.name: US_008_TC_001 When user click on Make an Appointment section First Name, Last Name, SSN, Email boxes should have been filled automatically. - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on "medunna_url" page.........................................passed When click on user icon.....................................................passed And click on Sign In option.................................................passed And enter "PatientJohn" in username input...................................passed And enter "12345Pp9$*" in password input....................................passed And click on Remember Me check box..........................................passed And click on Sign In submit button..........................................passed When click on MyPages.......................................................passed And click on Make an Appointment............................................passed Then verify that "Patient", "John", "456-58-9637" , "patientjohn@gmail.com" boxes are filled automatically.passed Then close the application..................................................passed
